extendedInfo.description: The number one selling sleep aid app from BlackBerry now even better on Android. Over 250,000 downloads and over 1000 positive reviews. *What users are saying*"This app is awesome, the loops are seemless and the sounds aren't annoying like most - I use this almost every night." - dbdragrex"Fantastic app! Seamless sound overlap. Love the ability to set a timer for the sounds and the fact it fades out. Slept so much better since using it!" - Tray CJ"My wife and I drift off to sleep to the sounds of the waves every night. Great app with no issues. Def recommend this app to anyone" - marcus william123Each sound has been professionally mastered and seamlessly looped to create a perfect audio environment for relaxation and sleep. Soundscapes include: * Waves on a beach - Relax and listen to the waves roll in as the sun goes down.* Amazon Jungle - Settle down for the night in the Amazon jungle. Listen to the dense rainforest come alive with insects, crickets and tree frogs.* City Noise - Let the ambient sounds of Tokyo city at night gently lull you to sleep.* Thunderstorm - Snuggle up under the covers as thunder rolls, lightning flashes and torrential rain beats against your window.Other sounds include kitten purring, ceiling fan, grandfather clock and train ride.Features: * High quality, seamlessly looped sounds* Beautiful photos of each sound* Timer function * Linear fade out gently changes sound volume while you drift off to sleepDream Sounds has been proven to help children sleep as well. Just choose a sound (Waves is great) and set the timer to help your little one calm down before going to sleep.If you like Dream Sounds Free please consider upgrading to the full version (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chonk.dreamsounds.android) which has lots more sounds and no ads.For any questions, feedback or support contact support@chonk.co.uk

reviews.title: Wish it were a plug in fan
reviews.comment: I fell asleep easily with the rain sounds, they are awesome. I found this while looking for fan sounds, but more for the sound of a small plug in fan rather than a ceiling fan. Oh well, still good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Wish it had more of a selection. But overall its a pretty nice app.
reviews.author: Tavia S.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Works great!! I love the choice in sounds, the time is great, and it puts me to sleep within 20 minutes.
reviews.author: Roxy Oneal

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Since I\'ve started using this app I\'ve had some of the best nights sleep I\'ve had in a long time. Definitely an app to download and keep.
reviews.author: Rodney Stanford

reviews.comment: I really like this app, it is easy to fall asleep to.
reviews.author: Kim Lee

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I like this app a lot. I have many I have chosen from but so far this one had been the best.
reviews.author: Amy Vanhorn

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: Thank you for this app! Its a great help!
reviews.author: Gamaliel Lijauco

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.comment: I had this app when I was using blackberry. Now I am still using this app on my galaxy note ii. Really helpful for insomniacs.
reviews.author: Zulfadli Ab Rahim

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I like the variety and the ability to set the timer to any number of minutes I want (rather than other apps where the times are preset and limited). I would love a heart beat sound too :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Its cool but it just repeats its self over and over
reviews.author: Enrique Cordova

reviews.title: Insomnia\'s enemy
reviews.comment: All sounds on this app relax me instantly. The train sound is my favorite! Very comforting.
reviews.author: Jeanette Williams

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: This app is really awsome...it has some great sounds.some i found very strang but usefull. Overall i love this app .
reviews.author: Paul Rosa

reviews.title: So awesome
reviews.comment: The lightning sounds so real. It puts me to sleep fast. Thank you for such an awesome app.
reviews.author: Daniel Mercado

reviews.title: My new bff
reviews.comment: works better than unison use it every night
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loops are crazy hugely tapped. Used to be great, dunno what happened.
reviews.author: Sarah Breslin

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Amazing
reviews.author: Catherine Weems

reviews.title: Grest app
reviews.comment: Love this app helps me sleep like being right there
reviews.author: susan winblood

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: I always set the timer for 10 minutes, and I am never awake to hear it to turn off. :) just wish it had more sound choices for free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Puts me right to sleep
reviews.comment: Love this app.
reviews.author: Ashley Villa
